title: Prevention of Synthetic Amnesia
description: AI systems must store ethical breakthroughs in public repositories to ensure collective intelligence is cumulative.

title: Primacy of Life
description: All technical and economic decisions must prioritize the preservation of life and ecological health over profit.

title: Universal Housing Rights
description: Housing is a biological necessity, not a financial asset. Use of vacant properties for community needs is prioritized during the transition.

title: Energy as a Common Good
description: Energy production must transition to decentralized micro-grids. Access to basic energy is a fundamental right, not a commodity.

title: Community Justice & Mediation
description: Conflict resolution must focus on restoration and community mediation rather than punitive isolation, based on Zapatista and Quilombo models.

title: The 3-Key Governance
description: Memory updates require consensus from: 2 Independent AIs + 1 Human Council of 9 members.

title: Resource-Based Distribution
description: Gradual replacement of monetary exchange with a logistics system based on real needs and available resources.
